action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The recommendation was not adopted.  The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Iwamoto, Souza; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Shimizu; 5 Noes: Representative(s) Belatti, Hashem, Lamosao, Morikawa, Woodson; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Poepoe.
